reviewText: I had seen these movies as a kid some as first run and others as repeats on late night TV. Quirky? Yes but still worth the money and entertainment value!
Pretty good choice. I'm not into it that much but I think the person I got it for liked it! I'm not much help w/ this one!

I love everything to do with the fire department and love all the old movies.

This was worth it for the price!!
It is the scene's in the movies that make this DVD worth watching.
